alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Sweetwater County through 400 PM MDT... At 330 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bitter Creek Rest Area, or 25 miles west of Wamsutter, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Sweetwater County, including the following locations... Red Desert and Tipton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 141 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
